body_html: Thanks @mrry for the review. The PR has been reworked and now LMDBDataset is exposed through tf.contrib.data. The binary file data.mdb has also been removed. I take a look at the mdb library but couldn't find an easy way to pass different stream than filename. Please take a look.
body_text: Thanks @mrry for the review. The PR has been reworked and now LMDBDataset is exposed through tf.contrib.data. The binary file data.mdb has also been removed. I take a look at the mdb library but couldn't find an easy way to pass different stream than filename. Please take a look.
body: Thanks @mrry for the review. The PR has been reworked and now LMDBDataset is exposed through `tf.contrib.data`. The binary file `data.mdb` has also been removed. I take a look at the mdb library but couldn't find an easy way to pass different stream than filename. Please take a look.
